Visualize vehicle location history and exception data using interactive heat maps. This tool integrates with your MyGeotab data to provide insights into vehicle patterns and behaviors.

Heatmap

This example demonstrates how to create an add-in to visualize location or exception (rule violation) history using a heat map.

Location History Exception History Shows battery levels, charging events, and battery health data

Instructions

  1. Choose to visualize by location history or exception history.
  2. If visualizing by exception history, select a rule for which to search for exceptions.
  3. Select the vehicle(s) to search on.
  4. Specify a date/time range.
  5. Optionally, check Include Electric Vehicle Data to overlay battery levels, charging events, and battery health information.
  6. Click the Show Heat Map button to update the map.
  7. After applying any changes to the MyGeotab Groups Filter, refresh the page to apply the filter to the list of vehicles and repeat the above steps.

When selecting veicles, use CTRL+Click to select/deselect individual vehicles or SHIFT+Click to select a range of vehicles. To select all vehicles in the list, first select one and then use CTRL+A.
